mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post_list_page_status (post_group_type_id, group_key, page_exists, created_at) VALUES (1, #{groupKey}, #{pageExists}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select: SELECT post_group_type_id, group_key, page_exists FROM post_list_page_status WHERE group_key = #{groupKey} AND deleted_at IS NULL
SELECT post_group_type_id, group_key, page_exists FROM post_list_page_status WHERE page_exists = #{pageExists} AND deleted_at IS NULL

select plps.post_group_type_id, plps.group_key, plps.page_exists from post_list_page_status plps left join post_list_page plp on plps.group_key = plp.group_key where plps.page_exists = false and plp.id is null;
